planet.name: MOA-2013-BLG-220L b
planet.description: MOA-2013-BLG-220L is a microlensing event observed in 2013. The lens system has a mass ratio of 0.003 but the distance and mass are not well constrained, so the system could range from a Saturn-mass planet orbiting a brown dwarf to a super-Jupiter orbiting a K-dwarf.
